name: Tau Group
description:
Tau is a technology company at the core of the electrification of transport and the decarbonization of energy.

Our climate technologies reconcile the necessity of sustainable manufacturing with the power, reliability and performance that e-mobility requires to enable smaller, greener and more powerful motors.

Tau’s protective coatings produce winding wire with superior dielectric, mechanical and chemical properties, while optimizing production processes of copper and steel wire for environmental friendliness with smart quality controls, predictive analytics and peace-of-mind operating simplicity.
slogan: At the very core of e-mobility
